descriptionlist.description:
This package depends Alderis package from Chariz: https://chariz.com/

Add pasteboard shortcuts to your keyboard dock!

Supporting notched devices (X, XS, XR, 11) running iOS 12-13. Mostly works with iPhone X UI enabling tweak. Compatible with Barmoji. If you own an iPad, check out XPad.

Available shortcuts:
-Select
-Select All
-Select Line
-Select Paragraph
-Select Sentence
-Copy
-Paste
-Cut
-Undo
-Redo
-Beginning of Document
-Ending of Document
-Capitalize
-Lowercase
-Uppercase
-Delete
-Bold
-Italic
-Underline
-Cursor Left
-Cursor Right
-Cursor Up
-Cursor Down
-Dismiss Keyboard
-Auto-Correction
-Auto-Capitalization
-Keyboard Input Type (NumPad, PhonePad etc)
-Define Word
-Shell Command
-Insert Text
-Previous Word
-Next Word
-Line Start
-Line End
-Start of Paragraph
-End of Paragraph
-Start of Sentence
-End of Sentence
-Globe
-Dictation

Third-party tweak shortcuts:
-CopyLog*
-Translomatic*
-Wasabi*
-Pasithea*

Available gestures:
-Single tap
-Long Press
-Double Tap
-"Shooting Star"

and many more default long press gesture for each shortcut

Go to setting page to manage your shortcuts.

To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs

*Package needs to be installed for shortcut to show.

changelog.change:
NEW FEATURES:
-Added Globe & Dictation shortcuts

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Fixed crash in Preferences when upgraded from v1
-Fixed icons not displayed properly in iOS 12

If you experiencing any issue or shortcuts not showing correctly, please reset.
